availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Parkhill married Sarah J Parmalee on May 23, 1859. He was a merchant in Louisville and a member of the jury.

bibl.p: Find A Grave, “James Parkhill (January 1, 1830-April 5, 1865),” Memorial #87243897, https://www.findagrave.com/cgi-bin/fg.cgi?page=gr&GRid=87243897 (accessed June 5, 2017); Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Jefferson, Louisville Ward 6, p. 58; Kentucky Birth, Marriage and Death Records ñ Microfilm (1852-1910), KDLA, Roll #994027-994058, Jefferson County Marriages, p. 1.
